title: Louise, The Adventures of a Chicken
description: She longed for adventure.So she left her home and ventured out into the wide world.The pleasures and perils she met proved marauding pirates on the majestic seas, a ferocious lion under the bright lights of the big top, a mysterious stranger in an exotic and bustling bazaar.Yet in the face of such daunting danger, our heroine . . .She was brave.She was fearless.She was feathered.She was a chicken.A not-so-chicken chicken.Her name?
author: Kate DiCamillo
